WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: * Important - since the attributes are in another view we need to specifie them
* ATTENTION - the name of the attribute is from the CONTEXT maped to this view, not from the LAYOUT
* APPEND INITIAL LINE TO lt_attributes ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_attribute>).
* FOR one level we can use dirrectly the name of the path, is not our case since we have nested nodes

* informations from the parameter <parent_element> and then
* A free navigation thru the context, especially to nodes on
* the same or deeper hierachical level is strongly discouraged,
* because such a strategy may easily lead to unresolvable
* if necessary, get static attributes of parent element
